name: Trampoline: Flip & Backflip
description:
Have you ever seen Mr.Trump with a trampoline. Now you can see in this game! Let's play with him on a trampoline.

* Features:
- Addictive gameplay
- Funny art style
- Global leaderboard to beat your friend score

* How to play:
- Touch left side of screen to backflip
- Touch right side of screen to flip
- Get as high as possible

* Have fun!
